Latest Projects

Flags Website (coming soon):

This project is an interactive website designed to help users learn and identify flags from countries around the world. The platform features a clean and engaging interface where users can explore flags by region, test their knowledge with quizzes, and discover facts such as country names, capitals, and geographic details. It caters to learners of all ages and backgrounds, including students, travelers, and educators. The website is responsive, making it accessible on both desktop and mobile devices. With an educational focus and user-friendly experience, this tool encourages curiosity and global awareness in a fun and visually rich learning environment.

Weather App (coming soon):

This project is a responsive weather application that provides users with accurate, real-time forecasts and location-based climate updates. The design features a minimalist interface with bold weather icons, making it simple and intuitive to use. Users can view daily and hourly forecasts, including temperature, wind, humidity, and precipitation levels. The app supports automatic geolocation as well as manual city searches, enhancing its versatility. Designed for both desktop and mobile platforms, the site ensures fast load times and easy access to essential weather data. Ideal for daily planning, this tool delivers reliable meteorological insights through a clean and modern experience.

Calculator (coming soon):

This project is a basic yet efficient calculator web application built for simple, everyday arithmetic operations. It includes essential functions like addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division, all within a sleek and intuitive layout. The interface is user-friendly and responsive, making it usable on desktops, tablets, and smartphones without any performance issues. The calculator is lightweight and free of unnecessary features, focusing on functionality and speed. It’s perfect for users who need a quick, accessible tool for fast calculations. Developed with clean code and clear design principles, the project demonstrates practical implementation of front-end development fundamentals in a useful format.
